TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit FormParameter extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.Parameter

summary.span: 将 HTTP 请求 字段的值绑定到参数对象。

span.span: Binds the value of an HTTP request field to a parameter object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 您可以使用类将集合中的窗体变量的值绑定到参数化的查询或命令中使用的参数。You can use the class to bind the value of a form variable in the collection to a parameter used in a parameterized query or command. 如果已指定，但未传递任何对应的窗体变量，则将数据绑定到参数的控件可能会引发异常。Controls that bind data to the parameter might throw an exception if a is specified but no corresponding form variable is passed. 如果在没有对应值的情况传递窗体变量时，它们也可能不显示任何数据。They might also display no data if the form variable is passed with no corresponding value. 在适当的情况下，将设置为避免出现这种情况。Set the to avoid these situations where appropriate. 类提供属性，该属性标识要绑定到的窗体变量的名称，以及从类继承的变量的名称。 The class provides the property, which identifies the name of the form variable to bind to, in addition to those inherited from the class. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不会以任何方式验证窗体元素所传递的值; 它将使用原始值。The does not validate the value passed by the form element in any way; it uses the raw value. 在大多数情况下，你可以通过处理事件 （例如`Selecting`，你所使用的数据源控件公开的、 `Updating` `Inserting`、或`Deleting`事件）来验证数据源控件使用的值。In most cases you can validate the value of the before it is used by a data source control by handling an event, such as the `Selecting`, `Updating`, `Inserting`, or `Deleting` event exposed by the data source control you are using. 如果参数的值未通过验证测试，则可以通过将关联 类的属性设置为来`true`取消数据操作。If the value of the parameter does not pass your validation tests, you can cancel the data operation by setting the property of the associated class to `true`. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件和简单的 ASP.NET 网页将数据插入到数据库中。The following code example demonstrates how to insert data into a database using the control and a simple ASP.NET Web page. 数据表中的当前数据显示在控件中。The current data in the data table is displayed in the control. 您可以通过在控件中输入值并单击 "" 按钮来添加新记录。You can add new records by entering values in the controls and clicking the button. 单击该按钮时，会将指定的值插入到数据库中，并且会刷新。When the button is clicked, the specified values are inserted into the database, and the is refreshed. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/CS/sql24cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.SqlDataSource_24sql/VB/sql24vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数创建的对象的所有属性的默认值都进行了初始化。 A object created with the constructor is initialized with default values for all its properties. 将初始化为 。 The is initialized to . 此外， 将属性初始化为 ， 将属性 初始化为，将属性初始化为，并初始化属性。 为 null （`Nothing`在 Visual Basic 中）。Additionally, the property is initialized to , the property is initialized to , the property is initialized to , and the property is initialized to null (`Nothing` in Visual Basic). ## Examples > [!IMPORTANT] > 不会以任何方式验证窗体元素所传递的值; 它将使用原始值。The does not validate the value passed by the form element in any way; it uses the raw value. 在大多数情况下，你可以通过处理事件（ 例如，你所使用的数据源控件公开的`Selecting`、 `Updating` `Inserting`、或`Deleting`事件）来验证数据源控件使用的值。In most cases, you can validate the value of the before it is used by a data source control by handling an event, such as the `Selecting`, `Updating`, `Inserting`, or `Deleting` event exposed by the data source control you are using. 如果参数的值未通过验证测试，则可以通过将关联 类的属性设置为来`true`取消数据操作。If the value of the parameter does not pass your validation tests, you can cancel the data operation by setting the property of the associated class to `true`. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter_1/CS/fp1cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter_1#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.FormParameter_1/VB/fp1vb.aspx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数创建的对象将使用指定的参数名称和标识参数绑定到的窗体变量的字符串来初始化。 A object created with the constructor is initialized with the specified parameter name and string that identifies the form variable that the parameter binds to. 用默认值初始化和属性。 The and properties are initialized with default values. ## Examples > [!IMPORTANT] > 不会以任何方式验证窗体元素所传递的值; 它将使用原始值。The does not validate the value passed by the form element in any way; it uses the raw value. 在大多数情况下，你可以通过处理事件（ 例如，你所使用的数据源控件公开的`Selecting`、 `Updating` `Inserting`、或`Deleting`事件）来验证数据源控件使用的值。In most cases, you can validate the value of the before it is used by a data source control by handling an event, such as the `Selecting`, `Updating`, `Inserting`, or `Deleting` event exposed by the data source control you are using. 如果参数的值未通过验证测试，则可以通过将关联 类的属性设置为来`true`取消数据操作。If the value of the parameter does not pass your validation tests, you can cancel the data operation by setting the property of the associated class to `true`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用构造函数创建的对象使用指定的参数名称、和字符串进行初始化，该字符串标识参数绑定到的窗体变量。 A object created with the constructor is initialized with the specified parameter name, , and string that identifies the form variable that the parameter binds to. 仅用默认值初始化和属性。 Only the and properties are initialized with default values. ## Examples > [!IMPORTANT] > 不会以任何方式验证窗体元素所传递的值; 它将使用原始值。The does not validate the value passed by the form element in any way; it uses the raw value. 在大多数情况下，你可以通过处理事件（ 例如，你所使用的数据源控件公开的`Selecting`、 `Updating` `Inserting`、或`Deleting`事件）来验证数据源控件使用的值。In most cases, you can validate the value of the before it is used by a data source control by handling an event, such as the `Selecting`, `Updating`, `Inserting`, or `Deleting` event exposed by the data source control you are using. 如果参数的值未通过验证测试，则可以通过将关联 类的属性设置为来`true`取消数据操作。If the value of the parameter does not pass your validation tests, you can cancel the data operation by setting the property of the associated class to `true`. remarks.format: ## Remarks 每 次调用方法时，尝试绑定到窗体变量。The attempts to bind to the form variable every time the method is called. 方法使用 参数从请求中检索指定窗体字段的值。 `context`The `context` parameter is used by the method to retrieve the value of the specified form field from the request. 忽略`control`参数。The `control` parameter is ignored.

summary.span: 获取或设置参数绑定到的窗体变量的名称。

span.span: Gets or sets the name of the form variable that the parameter binds to.

value.span: 标识作为参数绑定目标的窗体变量的字符串。

span.span: A string that identifies the form variable to which the parameter binds.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 标识传递到集合中的名称/值对。 The identifies a name/value pair that is passed in the collection. 尽管属性标识对的名称，但在运行时将绑定到其对应的值。 While the property identifies the name of the pair, the binds to its corresponding value at run time. 如果不将预期的窗体变量字符串名称/值对传递到集合中的 ASP.NET 网页，则方法会将参数绑定到属性的值（如果已设置）。If the expected form variable string name/value pair is not passed to the ASP.NET Web page in the collection, the method binds the parameter to the value of the property, if it is set. 如果未设置，则方法无法将参数绑定到值。 If the is not set, the method fails to bind the parameter to a value. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用控件和从中间层业务对象检索数据和用于显示结果的控件来显示筛选后的数据。The following code example demonstrates how to display filtered data using an control and a to retrieve data from a middle-tier business object and a control to display the results. 此代码示例包含一个、一个控件、 一个控件和一个提交按钮。The code example consists of a , a control, the control, and a submit button. 默认情况下， 将使用其中一个 Northwind 商贸员工的名称填充。By default, the is populated with the name of one of the Northwind Traders employees. 显示有关中的名称标识的雇员的信息。 The displays information about the employee identified by the name in the . 若要检索另一个雇员的数据，请在中输入雇员的全名，并单击按钮。To retrieve data on another employee, enter the full name of the employee in the and click the button. 属性指定一个表达式，该表达式用于筛选的检索数据。 The property specifies an expression used to filter the data retrieved by the . 此属性使用的参数占位符的计算结果为集合中包含的参数。This property uses parameter placeholders that are evaluated to the parameters contained in the collection. 在此示例中，参数占位符绑定到控件的值。In this example, the parameter placeholder is a bound to the value of the control. [!code-aspx-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/CS/objds9cs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/VB/objds9vb.aspx#1)] 下面的代码示例演示了之前的代码示例使用的中间层业务对象。The following code example shows the middle-tier business object that the previous code example uses. 此示例由两个基本类组成： `EmployeeLogic`类封装业务逻辑， `NorthwindEmployee`类是一个模型类，该类仅包含从数据层加载和保存数据所需的基本功能。This example consists of two basic classes: The `EmployeeLogic` class encapsulates business logic, and the `NorthwindEmployee` class is a model class that contains only the basic functionality required to load and persist data from the data tier. 为简单起见， `EmployeeLogic`类创建了静态数据集，而不是从数据层检索数据。For simplicity, the `EmployeeLogic` class creates a static set of data, rather than retrieving the data from a data tier. 这对于此示例也很有帮助，因为示例依赖于用户提供 Northwind 商贸员工的全名来演示筛选。It is also helpful for this example, because the sample relies on the user to provide the full name of a Northwind Traders employee to demonstrate filtering. 若要获取完整的工作示例，必须使用所提供的 ASP.NET 代码示例编译并使用这些类。For a complete working example, you must compile and use these classes with the ASP.NET code examples provided. > [!IMPORTANT] > 不会以任何方式验证窗体元素所传递的值; 它将使用原始值。The does not validate the value passed by the form element in any way; it uses the raw value. 在大多数情况下，你可以通过处理事件（ 例如，你所使用的数据源控件公开的`Selecting`、 `Updating` `Inserting`、或`Deleting`事件）来验证数据源控件使用的值。In most cases, you can validate the value of the before it is used by a data source control by handling an event, such as the `Selecting`, `Updating`, `Inserting`, or `Deleting` event exposed by the data source control you are using. 如果参数的值未通过验证测试，则可以通过将关联 类的属性设置为来`true`取消数据操作。If the value of the parameter does not pass your validation tests, you can cancel the data operation by setting the property of the associated class to `true`. [!code-csharp[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/CS/northwindemployee9.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/System.Web.UI.WebControls.ObjectDataSource_9/VB/northwindemployee9.vb#2)]
